vals.question: How does this phase usually begin?
vals.answer: Formal request to the IT department

vals.question: Where can a systems request come from?
vals.answer: Top Manager, Planning Team, a department head or IT department

vals.question: The purpose of this phase is to perform a __________ to evaluate an IT-related business opportunity or problem
vals.answer: What might a major systems request entail?

vals.question: What might a major systems request entail?
vals.answer: New Information system or upgrading a current system

vals.question: This type or process must continue in order to enter the analysis phase
What is the purpose of this phase?
vals.answer: Build a logical model of the new system

vals.question: The first step of this phase is ______________, where you investigate business processes and document what the new system must do to satisfy users
The deliverable for this phase is the __________?
Performing fact-finding using techniques such as interviews, surveys, document review, observation and sampling are done to achieve an _______ of the system
Name one thing a system requirements document would describe?
vals.answer: management and user requirements, costs and benefits, and outlines alternative development strategies

vals.question: What is the purpose of this phase?
vals.answer: To create a physical model that meets documented requirements

vals.question: What type of interface is designed during this phase?
The Logical Design is transformed into this
What must be determined in this phase?
Input from these two groups is critical at this stage of the process to avoid any misunderstanding about what the system will do, how much it will cost, review and approval
What is the objective of this phase
vals.answer: completely functioning and documented information system

vals.question: If software is purchased, a systems analyst performs these tasks to implement a working system
vals.answer: Configure and perform any necessary modifications

vals.question: This phase also includes an assessment called a _______ to determine whether the system operates properly and if cost benefits are within expectations
What three final preparations are made before a system is ready for final use?
vals.answer: Converting data, training users and performing transition to the new system

vals.question: Along with actually writing the software these things are also generated to help ensure functionality and understanding amongst other programmers and users
Who must be supported?
The main objective of this phase is to _____ on the IT investment
Beyond the obvious external threats, what other types of threats do organizations have to deal with?
A change in something like tax law would prompt this type of change to be required in an application
Business processes change rapidly. What do most systems require after several years of operation
